Class InteractableObject

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.interactableObjects.InteractableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Card, Computer, Ladder, MetalLocker, PaperBox, RedBox, WoodLocker
public abstract class InteractableObject extends Observable
abstract class, model, interactable objects such as chests, computers(to disable the enemies), etc... extend this abstract class.

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractableObject

      public InteractableObject(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the interactable object
      y - y coordinate of the interactable object
      width - width of the interactable object
      height - height of the interactable object

  • Method Details

    • open

      public abstract void open(Player player)
      opens the interactable object
      Parameters:
      player - current instance of the player that is trying to interact with the object

    • startInteraction

      public void startInteraction(boolean ePressed)
      starts the interactable object interaction (search). if the player stops pressing down e, the interaction (search) progress gets reset to 0.
      Parameters:
      ePressed - indicates if the 'e' is pressed or not
